name: Cybertracer
description:
The enhanced human huntress never stops chasing rogue androids in the cyber city.

- Earn credits for hunted androids.
- Get upgrades to hunt more efficiently.
- Beat the leader board.

TIPS:

- It will take time before you get used to free running in the city and learn all obstacles.
- Use the quick turn back (180 degrees) by quickly tapping twice the "DUCK" button.
- Getting the weapon upgrades (better range) first is the best option for beginners.

Good hunting!
